level.text: 101.1 Any notices, claims, requests, applications, or certificates that the Actr this chapter requires to be made shall be on approved forms.

101.2 All approved forms shall be obtained from the Program, including formsor requesting a hearing to appeal a decision of the Program regarding a claimor compensation. If a form pertains to requests for hearings or attorneyepresentation pursuant to §§ 129-132 of this chapter, forms shall be obtainedrom the Office of Hearings and Adjudication (OHA) of the Department ofmployment Services.

Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 28 DCR 2307 (May 22, 1981); asmended by a Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR540 (October 8, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by a Notice of Final Rulemakingublished at 57 DCR 12224 (December 24, 2010); repealed and replaced by Finalulemaking published at 59 DCR 8766, 8767 (July 27, 2012).
